titleNullable: Fashion Products on Amazon: Ratings, Prices, etc
subtitleNullable: Fashion Products on Amazon: Ratings, Prices, Metadata and more.
descriptionNullable:
# Fashion Products on Amazon: Ratings, Prices, etc
### Fashion Products on Amazon: Ratings, Prices, Metadata and more.
_____

### About this dataset
> This dataset contains a subset of a much larger data set containing over 7 million fashion products. The data was collected by extracting information from Amazon. The purpose of the dataset is to allow for analyses of ratings, prices, and reviews in order to understand customer trends and behaviors. The dataset could also be used to predict future trends
> 
> Analyzing customer reviews, ratings and prices of fashion products on Amazon can give you insights into what customers are looking for, what they like and don't like, and how much they're willing to spend. This dataset can be used to improve product selection, pricing and marketing strategies for fashion products sold on Amazon

### How to use the dataset
> This dataset contains a subset of a much larger data set containing over 7 million fashion products. The data was collected by extracting information from Amazon. The purpose of the dataset is to allow for analyses of ratings, prices, and reviews in order to understand customer trends and behaviors. The dataset could also be used to predict future trends
> 
> Analyzing customer reviews, ratings and prices of fashion products on Amazon can give you insights into what customers are looking for, what they like and don't like, and how much they're willing to spend. This dataset can be used to improve product selection, pricing and marketing strategies for fashion products sold on Amazon
> 
> Some possible research ideas include:
> 1. Analyze which features are most important to customers in order to better design products
> 2. Examine relationships between reviews and ratings to identify potential issues with products
> 3. Use customer questions and answers to improve product descriptions

### Research Ideas
> - Using the customer reviews and ratings, manufacturers can get feedback on their products and improve them accordingly.
> - By analyzing the prices of similar products, sellers can price their products competitively.
> - Questions and answers from customers can be used to create better product descriptions

### Acknowledgements
> 
> 
> ### License
> 
> 
> > **License: [CC0 1.0 Universal (CC0 1.0) - Public Domain Dedication](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)**
> > No Copyright - You can copy, modify, distribute and perform the work, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission. [See Other Information](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

### Columns

**File: amazon_co-ecommerce_sample.csv**
| Column name                                     | Description                                                   |
|:------------------------------------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------|
| **product_name**                                | The name of the product. (String)                             |
| **manufacturer**                                | The manufacturer of the product. (String)                     |
| **price**                                       | The price of the product. (Float)                             |
| **number_available_in_stock**                   | The number of the product available in stock. (Integer)       |
| **number_of_reviews**                           | The number of reviews for the product. (Integer)              |
| **number_of_answered_questions**                | The number of questions answered for the product. (Integer)   |
| **average_review_rating**                       | The average review rating for the product. (Float)            |
| **amazon_category_and_sub_category**            | The Amazon category and subcategory for the product. (String) |
| **customers_who_bought_this_item_also_bought**  | The customers who bought this item also bought. (String)      |
| **description**                                 | The description of the product. (String)                      |
| **product_information**                         | The product information. (String)                             |
| **product_description**                         | The product description. (String)                             |
| **items_customers_buy_after_viewing_this_item** | The items customers buy after viewing this item. (String)     |
| **customer_questions_and_answers**              | The customer questions and answers. (String)                  |
| **customer_reviews**                            | The customer reviews. (String)                                |
| **sellers**                                     | The sellers. (String)                                         |

This dataset can be used to improve product selection, pricing and marketing strategies for fashion products sold on Amazon
